subject: Dear fund beneficiary email
body:
Dear fund beneficiary email owner,
We sent you this letter a month ago, but i haven't heard from you, I’m
not sure if you received it, so I’ll say it again: first, I’m Mrs.
Kristalina georgieva, executive director and president of the
international monetary fund,
We have been asked by the president and the governing body of the
monetary unit of the United Nations to investigate the uncollected
funds that have long been due to be paid into the UN government's
basket, which has confused the owners that scammers using the name of
the United Nations have been deceived. During our investigation, our
system records with your email address that your payment belongs to a
list of 150 recipients categorized as: undelivered lottery money /
undelivered money / incomplete transfer of inheritance funds /
contracts,
We are appalled that your payment has been unnecessarily delayed by
corrupt bank officials to deceive your money, resulting in so many
losses on your end and unnecessary delays in receiving your payment.
The united nations and the international monetary fund (IMF) have
decided to pay all compensation to 150 recipients from north America,
south America, the united states, Europe and Asia and around the world
via atm visa card, as it is a global payment technology, which allows
consumers, businesses, financial institutions, and governments to use
digital currencies instead of cash and checks,
We have ensured that payment to you is made via an atm visa card made
out in your name and sent directly to your address via dhl or a
courier service available in your country. After you contact us, 2.5
Million Dollars  will be credited to your atm visa card, allowing you to
withdraw your money from any atm in your country with a minimum
withdrawal of $20,000 per day. Your limit can be increased to
$100,000.00 per day at your request,
In this regard, provide the below information's to us
1. Your full name (first and last name)====
2. Your full residential address and country===
3. Nationality===
4. Date of birth / gender===
5. Profession=====
6. Cell phone number a copy of your id: ====
7. Your company email address / private email address. ====
use this code (ref: client-606) as the subject of your email address
for identification and try to provide the above information to us
 To avoid further delays, we urge you to reply to this email as instructed,
Regards
From Office of Managing Director of the
International Monetary Fund (IMF)
Kristalina Georgieva

subject: Re:   Dear fund beneficiary email
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your email caught me by surprise! It's not every day that one receives a message from the Office of the Managing Director of the Monetary Fund IMF.

I'm curious about this whole process. Could you please explain more about how my name ended up on this list of recipients? And how did you come across my email address?

Also, could you provide more details about this ATM Visa Card? How does it work exactly? Is it safe and secure?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Yvonne
